definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: Twelve years later, she did, becoming the boxer’s fourth wife.
sentences.chinese: 十二年後，她果真如願成爲拳王的第四任妻子。

sentences.english: That day the George Foreman grill was born.
sentences.chinese: 那天便是拳王智烤爐誕生的日子。

sentences.english: Did you watch the World Boxing Championship yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 昨天你看了世界拳王爭霸賽了嗎？

sentences.english: The young boxer came at the champion cautiously.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的拳擊手小心翼翼地逼向拳王。

sentences.english: Did you watch the World’s Boxing Championship yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 你看了昨天的世界拳王爭霸賽了嗎？

sentences.english: According to this article, the former boxing champ is going to try again.
sentences.chinese: 根據這篇文章所言，前拳王又出山了。

sentences.english: Berto is the WBC welterweight titleholder.
Muhammad Ali is the most typical Liezi.
sentences.chinese: 拳王阿里就是最典型的列子。

sentences.english: The George Forman Grill became the best selling electric appliance in history.
sentences.chinese: 拳王智烤爐成爲有史以來最銷量最好的電動廚具。

sentences.english: Finally, the ultimate winner will be granted the world tiltle.
sentences.chinese: 最後，終極勝方可贏得世界拳王名銜。

definition: (Internet slang) to mouth off/to shoot one's mouth off/sb who does that
to fight, esp. with hands/wrestling (as a sport)/to wrestle/to wrestle (against fate, with a problem etc)/to capture prey
Bruce Lee (1940-1973), Hong Kong actor and martial arts expert
